title: Southwest Chief Timetable
heading: Amtrak's Southwest Chief
bottom_text:
MST Mountain Standard Time
Arizona does not observe Daylight Savings Time.
Please double-check all Arizona calling times
when spring and fall clock changes
occur in other states.

Local connecting trains are provided:
at Chicago and Naperville by Metra,
at Kansas City by KC Streetcar,
at Albuquerque by New Mexico RailRunner Express,
at San Bernardino, Riverside, Fullerton, and Los Angeles by Metrolink,
and at Los Angeles by LA Metro.
